entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:01 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:01 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:01 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
